Learning Outcomes: LO1: Perform farming activities and equipment operations according to standard operating procedures.
LO2: Execute farming operations work in accordance to regulations, WSH practices and housekeeping rules.
course_info.TSC Title: Urban Farming Implementation and Management Control

analyst_responses.What are the performance gaps in the ind: A prevalent issue in the sector is the lack of understanding of regulatory compliance and workplace safety measures. Many workers are not adequately trained to implement safe practices, which can lead to accidents and inefficiencies. Furthermore, there is a need for improved management practices that align with environmental sustainability and resource conservation.
analyst_responses.Why do you think this WSQ course will ad: The course provides essential training on executing operations in line with safety regulations and best practices. By fostering an understanding of proper operational procedures, participants will be better prepared to maintain a safe working environment while also promoting sustainable farming methods, ultimately improving overall operational effectiveness.
